summary: If you have trouble detaching to manifest what you desire, this emoji spell is for you.
body:
If you have trouble detaching to manifest what you desire, this emoji spell is for you.

Mediate for three minutes. Let it go.

✨ 🌟 🔮 😴 💤 😒 🌬 💨 👋🏻☺️✨🔮 🌈✨


Likes to charge the detach process and to allow yourself to blow the frustrations away.

Reblogs to cast to allow your subconscious letting go and thinking of more important things to do than sitting and wishing your manifest will come. ✨🌈

summary:
*Afterlife*
James: So he named a child after Snivellus
Lily: Yes
James: I'll ask again. He, my own son, my own blood, named his...
body:
*Afterlife*
James: So he named a child after Snivellus
Lily: Yes
James: I'll ask again. He, my own son, my own blood, named his son after Severus Snape
Lily: The answer is not going to change as much as you ask, you know?
James: I died for him, and he names his child after the greasy git
Lily: He named his first born after you
James: James III then!

dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: So he named a child after Snivellus

dialogue.name: James
dialogue.label: James:
dialogue.phrase: I'll ask again. He, my own son, my own blood, named his son after Severus Snape

dialogue.phrase: I died for him, and he names his child after the greasy git

dialogue.label: Lily:
dialogue.phrase: He named his first born after you

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: onyx-in-black
blog.title: 🌙snake eater🌙
blog.description: ♤Onyx Obsidian♤Slytherin♤seventh year♤indie HP OC rp blog♤

summary: Open starter》 hiding in the green house
body:
Open starter》 hiding in the green house

The noise of Hogwarts was definitely different to the noise back at ilvermorny. Well, different to Onyx. It could be because he was new, it could also be maybe he was homesick. But the Slytherin found himself wondering the grounds, he’s always been a thinker and perhaps he thinks too much, becuase by the time he silenced his thoughts he was at the door of the green house.

Herbology was a subject he did enjoy. He liked plants, greenery was comforting to him. His emerald eyes looked around, almost like he was sneaking in before he slipped through the door and was now surrounded by lush green leaves and colorful blooms, that of wich can’t-spells could only dream about.

He breathed in the many scents the flowers put off before finding himself wondering about the impossibly large green house. Perhaps, he wasn’t allowed in here after class hours were over and perhaps, he didnt care.
